channel.title: Air-Fryer on Loving my tummy
channel.description: Recent content in Air-Fryer on Loving my tummy

item.title: Crispy Gnocchi
item.description: In a bowl, add the gnocchi, spices, salt, and oil, and mix well. Place the gnocchi in the air fryer. Set the air fryer to 180-200째C (350-400째F) for 15-20 minutes. Halfway through the cooking time, shake the gnocchi to ensure even cooking. From Instagram @fussimonsi.

item.title: Garlic mushrooms
item.description: Wash and slice the mushrooms into thick slices. Mix them with garlic, parsley, chili pepper, oil, and salt. Preheat your air fryer. Cook them at 190째C (375째F) for 10 minutes (halfway through cooking, open the air fryer and stir them). From Instagram @misrecetasairfryercosori.
